page.title: 11Social Events
page.content: Entertainment is very limited due to the rural nature of Denby. Most {concerts or discos}that occur are held in the hall of the primary school and organised by the various clubs in the village. The pub, which is in the centre of village is called The George. Each week it has a{Goldies {Oldies}evening. It also provides lunches and bar snacks. Each Boxing Day it hosts the{local hunt-the {Rockwood Harriers}-to which hundreds of spectators come. This hunt rides the Denby area throughout the winter. {The Gunthwaite Steam Preservation {Society}hold a one day event annually demonstrating the old farm machinery together with craft stalls etc at a farm in the village. Each Xmas{carol {singing}around the village is arranged as will as a{community bonfire}in November.
